MazamaSatelliteUtils 0.2.6
  • Reference
  • Changelog

List downloaded GOES AOD files for a specified date and hour

goesaodc_listFiles.Rd

Retrieve a list of GOES AOD files available in the satelliteDataDir for a specified date and hour.

Note that all files for a particular hour will be returned even if the incoming startdate or jdate is specified to the minute or second.

goesaodc_listFiles(satID = NULL, startdate = NULL, jdate = NULL,
  fullDay = FALSE)

Arguments

satID

ID of the source GOES satellite (G16 or G17).
startdate

desired date in any Ymd [H] format or POSIXct
jdate

desired date in as a Julian date string, i.e. as seen in the netcdf filenames
fullDay

Specifies that the user wants an entire day's worth of data

Value

Vector of filenames.

Examples

# \donttest{
library(MazamaSatelliteUtils)
setSatelliteDataDir("~/Data/Satellite")

date_with_hour <- "2019-09-06 16"
goesaodc_listFiles(satID = "G16", startdate = date_with_hour)
#>  [1] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491601094_e20192491603467_c20192491610121.nc"
#>  [2] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491606094_e20192491608467_c20192491615088.nc"
#>  [3] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491611094_e20192491613467_c20192491620114.nc"
#>  [4] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491616094_e20192491618467_c20192491625131.nc"
#>  [5] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491621094_e20192491623467_c20192491630089.nc"
#>  [6] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491626094_e20192491628467_c20192491635120.nc"
#>  [7] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491631094_e20192491633467_c20192491640112.nc"
#>  [8] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491636094_e20192491638467_c20192491645095.nc"
#>  [9] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491641094_e20192491643467_c20192491650101.nc"
#> [10] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491646094_e20192491648467_c20192491655131.nc"
#> [11] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491651094_e20192491653467_c20192491700096.nc"
#> [12] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491656094_e20192491658467_c20192491705115.nc"

jdate <- "201924916"
goesaodc_listFiles(satID = "G17", jdate = jdate, fullDay = TRUE)
#>  [1] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491801196_e20192491803569_c20192491805437.nc"
#>  [2] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491806196_e20192491808569_c20192491810456.nc"
#>  [3] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491811196_e20192491813569_c20192491815453.nc"
#>  [4] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491816196_e20192491818569_c20192491820468.nc"
#>  [5] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491821196_e20192491823569_c20192491825491.nc"
#>  [6] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491826196_e20192491828569_c20192491830494.nc"
#>  [7] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491831196_e20192491833569_c20192491835517.nc"
#>  [8] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491836196_e20192491838569_c20192491840517.nc"
#>  [9] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491841196_e20192491843569_c20192491845528.nc"
#> [10] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491846196_e20192491848569_c20192491850525.nc"
#> [11] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491851196_e20192491853569_c20192491855529.nc"
#> [12] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G17_s20192491856196_e20192491858569_c20192491900549.nc"

day_only <- "2019-09-06"
goesaodc_listFiles(satID = "G16", startdate = day_only)
#>  [1] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491601094_e20192491603467_c20192491610121.nc"
#>  [2] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491606094_e20192491608467_c20192491615088.nc"
#>  [3] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491611094_e20192491613467_c20192491620114.nc"
#>  [4] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491616094_e20192491618467_c20192491625131.nc"
#>  [5] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491621094_e20192491623467_c20192491630089.nc"
#>  [6] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491626094_e20192491628467_c20192491635120.nc"
#>  [7] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491631094_e20192491633467_c20192491640112.nc"
#>  [8] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491636094_e20192491638467_c20192491645095.nc"
#>  [9] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491641094_e20192491643467_c20192491650101.nc"
#> [10] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491646094_e20192491648467_c20192491655131.nc"
#> [11] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491651094_e20192491653467_c20192491700096.nc"
#> [12] "OR_ABI-L2-AODC-M6_G16_s20192491656094_e20192491658467_c20192491705115.nc"
# }
